snippet: The Russia-based Kontinental Hockey League will expand into China next season with a team in Beijing, the host city for the 2022 Winter Olympics.
abstract: Russia's Kontinental Hockey League plans expansion team in Beijing.
lead_paragraph: The Russia-based Kontinental Hockey League will expand into China next season with a team in Beijing, the host city for the 2022 Winter Olympics.

headline.main: Kontinental Hockey League Expanding to China
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; Expansion in Russia
